page.title: 06Cupar Education
page.content: 4 of Cupar's 5{schools}are to be found in this D/Block:_Castlehill Nursery, Castlehill Infant School, St.Columba's Catholic Primary School, & Bell Baxter High School. Castlehill Infant School houses 86 infants (5-7 year olds).The infants are taught by 6 full_time teachers & 1 auxiliary.The{nursery}accommodates 88 pre_school children taught by 2 teachers, 2 assistants & 1 auxiliary. The 85_pupil Catholic Primary School aims to teach in a strong Christian atmosphere.Here there are 4 full_time & 5 visiting teachers.The{school}has a wide catchment area, reaching as far as Newburgh, Strathmiglo, Ceres, Balmullo & Tayport.After completing their{primary education,}the pupils usually transfer to St. Andrew's High School, Kirkcaldy or Bell Baxter in Cupar.
